timestamp.name: Timestamp Editor
timestamp.caption: PowerShell script to edit file timestamps

quick-notes.name: Quick Notes
quick-notes.caption: Browser extension to take short, quick notes

asciicat.name: PowerShell ASCII Cat
asciicat.caption: PowerShell script to generate a random ASCII cat. Can be used to generate one upon PowerShell console launch.

sched-del.name: Scheduled File Deleter
sched-del.caption: PowerShell script to schedule file deletions

recycle.name: Recycle Bin Size Script
recycle.caption: A small script to check one's recycle bin size

covid-cashier.name: COVID Cashier
covid-cashier.caption: A game to inform on safe restaurant cashiering workplace during a pandemic

chords.name: Chords
chords.caption: A small site with an online piano. Play, save, and share chords.

user-gen.name: Username Generator
user-gen.caption: Generates a username based on a random adjective and noun.

words-api.name: Words API
words-api.caption: An API that returns a noun, adjective, or animal via a GET request to the site.

calendar.name: Calendar Phone Background Generator
calendar.caption: A Processing application to generate a calendar background for a smartphone

drivetest.name: DriveTest Centre Checker
drivetest.caption: A script to check whether DriveTest centres have opened (closure is due to the COVID-19 pandemic)

quicksort.name: Quicksort Demo
quicksort.caption: A Processing to demonstrate the quicksort algorithm

twitter.name: TTC Twitter Bot
twitter.caption: A Twitter bot to filter and private message subscribing users TTC service tweets relevant to their routes

collage.name: Collage Generator
collage.caption: A collage generator site. Upload an image and a collage will be created. Inspired by an AP Computer Science Student Lab.

projects.name: Projects Page
projects.caption: This page: a portfolio of my work and projects. Originally written with JQuery before being refactored into React.
